languages.text: "Наши саги давно уже стали одной, а традиция велит, чтобы о погребении свидетельствовал не посторонний, а член клана. У меня нет никого ближе тебя здесь".
"Our sagas have long since become one, and tradition bids that the burial be witnessed by another clan member, not an outsider. I have no one closer than you here."
languages.original_text: "Наши саги давно уже стали одной, а традиция велит, чтобы о погребении свидетельствовал не посторонний, а член клана. У меня нет никого ближе тебя здесь".

traits.locale_text: "Our sagas have long since become one, and tradition bids that the burial be witnessed by another clan member, not an outsider. I have no one closer than you here."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “我们的史诗早已融为一体，而根据传统，太空野狼的葬礼必须由另一位族人见证，不能让外人参加。我身边已经没有比你更亲近的人了。”
languages.original_text: "Our sagas have long since become one, and tradition bids that the burial be witnessed by another clan member, not an outsider. I have no one closer than you here."

traits.locale_text: “我们的史诗早已融为一体，而根据传统，太空野狼的葬礼必须由另一位族人见证，不能让外人参加。我身边已经没有比你更亲近的人了。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「俺たちのサーガができてずいぶん経つが、他のクランメンバーが見守る中で埋葬するのが伝統だ。部外者じゃダメなんだ。ここにお前ほど仲の良い奴はいない」
languages.original_text: "Our sagas have long since become one, and tradition bids that the burial be witnessed by another clan member, not an outsider. I have no one closer than you here."

traits.locale_text: 「俺たちのサーガができてずいぶん経つが、他のクランメンバーが見守る中で埋葬するのが伝統だ。部外者じゃダメなんだ。ここにお前ほど仲の良い奴はいない」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «Nuestras sagas se han unido desde hace tiempo y la tradición dicta que el entierro lo presencie alguien del clan y no un forastero. Ahora mismo, no hay nadie más cercan{mf|o|a}».
languages.original_text: "Our sagas have long since become one, and tradition bids that the burial be witnessed by another clan member, not an outsider. I have no one closer than you here."

traits.locale_text: «Nuestras sagas se han unido desde hace tiempo y la tradición dicta que el entierro lo presencie alguien del clan y no un forastero. Ahora mismo, no hay nadie más cercan{mf|o|a}».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « Nos sagas se confondent depuis longtemps et la tradition exige qu'un autre membre du clan – et non un étranger – assiste à l'enterrement. Je n'ai personne de plus proche que vous, ici. »
languages.original_text: "Our sagas have long since become one, and tradition bids that the burial be witnessed by another clan member, not an outsider. I have no one closer than you here."

traits.locale_text: « Nos sagas se confondent depuis longtemps et la tradition exige qu'un autre membre du clan – et non un étranger – assiste à l'enterrement. Je n'ai personne de plus proche que vous, ici. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Unsere Sagen sind längst zu einer verschmolzen, und die Tradition verlangt, dass ein anderes Clanmitglied bei der Bestattung zugegen ist, kein Fremder. Niemand steht mir hier näher als Ihr."
languages.original_text: "Our sagas have long since become one, and tradition bids that the burial be witnessed by another clan member, not an outsider. I have no one closer than you here."

traits.locale_text: "Unsere Sagen sind längst zu einer verschmolzen, und die Tradition verlangt, dass ein anderes Clanmitglied bei der Bestattung zugegen ist, kein Fremder. Niemand steht mir hier näher als Ihr."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Destanlarımız epeydir bağlantılıdır. Gelenekler, defne bir yabancıdan ziyade klan ferdinin şahit olmasını gerektirir. Burada en yakınım sensin."
languages.original_text: "Our sagas have long since become one, and tradition bids that the burial be witnessed by another clan member, not an outsider. I have no one closer than you here."

traits.locale_text: "Destanlarımız epeydir bir aradalar ve gelenekler, defne bir yabancının değil klan üyesinin şahit olmasını gerektiriyor. Burada senden daha yakın olduğum kimse yok."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
